articles.author: DAKE KANG Associated Press
articles.title: The shunned: People from virus-hit city tracked, quarantined
articles.description: As China institutes the largest quarantine in history, people who have recently been to Wuhan are being tracked, monitored, turned away from hotels and shoved into isolation at their homes and in makeshift quarantine facilities
articles.content:
BEIJING -- 
Meron Mei, a sophomore at Wuhan University in the Chinese city at the heart of a viral outbreak, went back to his home village and started to cough.
So he went to the hospital and got checked. Doctors determined it was a common cold, not the new… [+8282 chars]

articles.author: BEATRICE DUPUY Associated Press
articles.title: Medical professionals battle virus misinformation online
articles.description: As medical professionals around the world grapple with combating the new virus spreading from China, some have turned to social media to fight the onslaught of misinformation surrounding it
articles.content:
Dr. Rose Marie Leslie, a family physician at the University of Minnesota, is fighting misleading and false information around a virus outbreak with the very tool used to spread much of it: social media.

articles.author: Catherine Thorbecke
articles.title: Facebook, Twitter and Google take steps to stop spread of coronavirus conspiracy theories
articles.description: As the novel coronavirus spreads, so has a slew of online misinformation and conspiracy theories about the mysterious illness.
articles.content:
As the coronavirus spreads, so has a slew of online misinformation, conspiracy theories and fear about the mysterious illness that was declared a global health emergency by the World Health Organization this week.

articles.title: Delta suspends all US flights to China amid coronavirus
articles.description: Delta Airlines suspended all of its flights to China, as coronavirus cases in China top 9,600.
articles.content:
Delta Airlines suspended all of its flights to China as coronavirus cases in the country top 9,600.
